snippet: This Midwestern city best known for its barbecue, bebop jazz and, for most of the past three decades, bad baseball has exploded into a sea of blue as long-suffering Royals fans suddenly find their team at the center of the sports universe....

headline.print_headline: Royals' Run to World Series Has Kansas City Abuzz
headline.main: Royals' Run to World Series Has Kansas City Abuzz

lead_paragraph: This Midwestern city best known for its barbecue, bebop jazz and, for most of the past three decades, bad baseball has exploded into a sea of blue as long-suffering Royals fans suddenly find their team at the center of the sports universe.
